# Float.Magnitude

**Type Alias**

A type that can represent the absolute value of any possible value of the conforming type.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Magnitude = Float
```

## Finding the Sign and Magnitude

- **magnitude**: The magnitude of this value.
- **sign**: The sign of the floating-point value.

items.description: The sign of the floating-point value.
items.name: sign
